8243.quoteText: If you wish to cancel your account, you can do so by accessing our platform or contacting us for assistance with the process.

8244.quoteText: Like many other companies, we do not honor DNT flags
8244.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

8638.title: This service is only available to users of age 13 and older.

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
tosdr.tldr:
"This Service is offered and made available only to users meeting the minimum legal age to provide their own consent to data processing, collection, and use (e.g., at least 13 years of age in the US and at least 13 to 16 years of age in the EU, depending on the country)."
"By using or attempting to use the Service, you certify that you are at least the minimum age and meet any other eligibility requirements of the Service. If you are found to be under the minimum age, your account may be terminated without notice." While this rule doesn't hint on it, users who registered before reaching minimal age and continued to use the service after meeting it can also have their accounts terminated at any point, if they get exposed for it.
